alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 7:12PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Wichita and eastern Greeley Counties through 645 PM MDT/745 PM CDT/... At 612 PM MDT/712 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles southwest of Leoti, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of Wichita and eastern Greeley Counties, including the following locations... Lydia and Selkirk. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
